name: The Last Barbarian by Viktor Black
name_original: The Last Barbarian by Viktor Black
description:
The Last Barbarian is a massive, open-world Fantasy Adventure game set in the original world of N'ul-realm. Full of many of the fantasy tropes you’re familiar with, it has hack-and-slash action, riddles, mind control, magic, treasure and plenty of quests - along with all kinds of kink!

Check the game on patreon or subscribestar and support it to make it better!

https://www.patreon.com/thelastbarbarian

https://subscribestar.adult/viktorblack

Join Discord server:
https://discord.gg/fdHGEyA
